name: PigLatin Translator

screenshots.caption: It's a command line interface (come on, what more do you want from me?!)

short_description:
This is a program which pretty much translates English to gibberish.

This is the most useless program you will ever download and run on your machine, so beware!

This was all coded in C++ for any of you that actually care about how this program was made (which is highly unlikely, but I digress...).

I would like to thank those who contributed on Stack Overflow for making this program possible.

Feel free to leave a review (whether it's good or not, it's not like this program will change peoples' lives... or will it?).
summary: The most useless program you'll ever download in your life.
